line.originaltext: 1/2 cup ketchup
4 tablespoons unsweetened pineapple juice
4 tablespoons molasses
2 tablespoons dark rum
2 tablespoons prepared Dijon-style mustard
2 cloves garlic, chopped
salt and pepper to taste
8 chicken thighs
To Make Glaze: In a medium bowl combine the ketchup, pineapple juice, molasses, rum, mustard and garlic.

line.originaltext: To Make Glaze: In a medium bowl combine the ketchup, pineapple juice, molasses, rum, mustard and garlic.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and mix well.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and mix well.
Place chicken pieces in a lightly oiled 9x13 inch baking dish; brush both sides with prepared glaze, using about 1/2 of the glaze.

Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

line.originaltext: Turn pieces, brush with remaining glaze and bake for another 25 minutes or until chicken is tender.

line.originaltext: Preheat oven to broil.
Put chicken under broiler and lightly brown on both sides, about 2 to 3 minutes each side.
